description.en:
Legion For Justice ($LEGION) is a community-driven project built on Binance Smart Chain #BSC, and to reward our community, 2% of each transaction goes back to holders. 

LEGION is deflationary, and 2% of each transaction is burnt.

Legion For Justice brings the most disruptive approach to the BSC ecosystem. We strive to provide a wholesome platform which will help newbie and experienced trader with first-hand information, vulnerabilities of project before launch. 

Our groundbreaking project review platform will cover upcoming potential projects extensively and protect people from potential scams and manipulations. And the cherry on the top, to help our community who suffered due to market manipulation and scam projects, will airdrop stable coin as a reward through the Rug reimbursement wallet, which will help them recover some of their losses.
